channel.title: Raid - Deep Stone Crypt on
channel.description: Recent content in Raid - Deep Stone Crypt on

item.title: Heritage
item.description: Heritage is a kinetic “precision frame” (slug) shotgun that can drop from the 2nd and 3rd encounters of the Deep Stone Crypt raid. After the initial drop, you have a chance of getting additional rolls from the raid’s secret chests. As of Season 12, it is the only legendary kinetic slug shotgun that is viable in leveled content. ðŸŒŽ Long-Distance Relationship (pvp) With a base Range of 71, you can max out the Range on a Heritage roll to give you a bit of an edge in shotgun duels.
